page.name: csv_data_type
page.div: Please select Char data type for Date and Datetime columns.

div.span: **File names should not contain any special characters. File name can have Spaces or separated by Underscores(_).
**File names should not contain any special characters. File name can have Spaces or separated by Underscores(_).
